title: Strategies for Designing and Operating Online and Hybrid Classes

context.prior_knowledge: Basic educational technology knowledge and LMS (Learning Management System) operational experience
context.additional_context: Enhancing online lesson design competencies in language education for pre-service and in-service teachers

learning_goals: Propose at least three strategies to promote learner interaction in online course design
Compare advantages and disadvantages of hybrid classes to develop context-appropriate operational plans
Design summative assessment-based learning outcome measurement methods using LMS-based evaluation tools
Analyze online education satisfaction survey results to derive course improvement strategies
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
